item.title: Bank of America raises gold forecast, noting Trump threat to Federal Reserve independence
item.description: The Wall Street investment bank said it remains bullish on gold, "with a short-/medium-term target of US$4,000/oz."

item.title: Why investors should rebalance their portfolios right now, according to Wells Fargo
item.description: Here's where Wells Fargo is moving money to now.

item.title: This rail stock is toying with a breakout. One should emerge soon, says Carter Worth
item.description: Carter Worth breaks down the charts on GATX Corp.

item.title: Bank of America downgrades chipmaker Marvell Technology on lower growth outlook
item.description: Shares have pulled back more than 30% in 2025.

item.title: This Chinese electric vehicle stock is running out of steam as competition heats up, says Bank of America
item.description: Shares have ticked down about 3% in 2025.
